data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Earnings Call Transcript
data.news_body:
This is a continuation of the Earnings Conference Call transcript submitted on August 4 2025 for the call held on Tuesday July 29 2025.

We wish to inform you that the revenue from the new wealth management team was inadvertently stated only for a month as Rs. 8 Crores whereas revenue for the Q1FY26 was Rs. 28 Crores.

Accordingly we are enclosing herewith revised transcript.

data.news_body: This is to inform you that pursuant to Regulation 30 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 (SEBI-LODR), the Board of Directors of the Company at their meeting held today i.e. January 23, 2023 has inter-alia considered and approved Unaudited financial results (standalone and consolidated) of the Company for the quarter and nine months ended December 31, 2022 along with the Limited Review Report from the Statutory Auditors of the Company as required under Regulation 33 and 52 of the SEBI- LODR.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Investor Presentation
data.news_body: We would like to inform you that, in view of the approval of the Board of Directors of IIFL Securities Limited ('Company') to the proposed Scheme of Arrangement between the Company and 5paisa Capital Limited and their respective shareholders and creditors under Sections 230 to 232 and other applicable provisions of the Companies Act, 2013 ('Scheme'), we enclose herewith the Investor Presentation for your information and record.

data.caption: Disclosures Of Related Party Transactions Under Regulation 23(9) Of The SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, As Amended ('SEBI Listing Regulations')
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 23(9) of the SEBI Listing Regulations, please find enclosed herewith disclosures of related party transactions on in the revised format, as prescribed by SEBI Circular No. SEBI/HO/CFD/CMD1/CIR/P/2021/662 dated 22nd November 2021, for the half year ended commencing from 01st April 2022 to 30th September 2022. The same is published on the website of the Company at www.iiflsecurities.com.Kindly take the above on record and oblige.

data.news_body: This is to inform you that pursuant to Regulation 30 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 (SEBI-LODR), the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held today i.e. October 20, 2022 has, inter-alia, considered and approved unaudited financial results (standalone and consolidated) of the Company for the quarter and half year ended September 30, 2022 along with the Limited Review Report from the Statutory Auditor of the Company as required under Regulation 33 and 52(4) of SEBI-LODR.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for  Outcome Of The Board Meeting
data.news_body:
This is to inform you that pursuant to Regulation 30 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 (SEBI-LODR), the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held today i.e. October 20, 2022 has, inter-alia, considered and approved unaudited financial results (standalone and consolidated) of the Company for the quarter and half year ended September 30, 2022 along with the Limited Review Report from the Statutory Auditor of the Company as required under Regulation 33 and 52(4) of SEBI-LODR.

The results have been uploaded on the Stock exchange websites at https://www.nseindia.com and https://www.bseindia.com and on the website of the Company at www.iiflsecurities.com

The meeting of the Board of Directors commenced at 12.30 p.m. and concluded at 3.40 p.m.

data.caption: Outcome Of The Board Meeting
data.news_body:
This is to inform you that pursuant to Regulation 30 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 (SEBI-LODR), the Board of Directors of the Company at their meeting held today has inter-alia considered and approved:-

1. Unaudited financial results (standalone and consolidated) of the Company for the quarter and half year ended September 30, 2021. In this regard, we are enclosing the Unaudited financial results (Standalone and Consolidated) along with the Limited Review Report from the Statutory Auditors of the Company as required under Regulation 33 of the SEBI- LODR.

The results have been uploaded on the Stock exchange websites at https://www.nseindia.com and https://www.bseindia.com and on the website of the Company at www.iiflsecurities.com.

The meeting of the Board of Directors commenced at 11.30 am and concluded at 01.50 pm.

Kindly take the above on record and oblige.

data.news_body:
This is to inform you that pursuant to Regulation 30 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 (SEBI-LODR), the Board of Directors of the Company at their meeting held today has inter-alia considered and approved:-

1. Unaudited financial results (standalone and consolidated) of the Company for the quarter and half year ended September 30, 2021. In this regard, we are enclosing the Unaudited financial results (Standalone and Consolidated) along with the Limited Review Report from the Statutory Auditors of the Company as required under Regulation 33 of the SEBI- LODR.

The results have been uploaded on the Stock exchange websites at https://www.nseindia.com and https://www.bseindia.com and on the website of the Company at www.iiflsecurities.com.

The meeting of the Board of Directors commenced at 11.30 am and concluded at 01.50 pm.

Kindly take the above on record and oblige.
